alert.note: Alert for Cabo Rojo; Hormigueros; Mayaguez; San German (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 19 at 9:13PM ADT until September 20 at 12:45AM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 AM AST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including the following counties, Cabo Rojo, Hormigueros, Mayaguez and San German. * WHEN...Until 1230 AM AST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 812 PM AST, River gauges indicated that Rio Guanajibo is out of its banks from excessive rainfall, and additional shower are observed in radar. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Hormigueros, Cabo Rojo, Mayaguez, San German, Monte Grande, Puerto Real and Sabana Eneas. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Cabo Rojo; Hormigueros; Mayaguez; San German
